definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
lit. to foster an ulcer and bequeath a calamity (idiom); tolerating budding evil can only lead to disaster/to cherish a viper in one's bosom
to produce the opposite of the desired result
large tail obstructs action (idiom); bottom heavy/fig. rendered ineffective by subordinates
internal friction/internal dissipation of energy (in mechanics)/fig. waste or discord within an organization
to have disastrous consequences/also written 貽害無窮|贻害无穷[yi2 hai4 wu2 qiong2]
to cut one's flesh to cover a sore (idiom); faced with a current crisis, to make it worse by a temporary expedient
to let sb do whatever they want/to indulge/to give free reins to/to let things slide/to drift aimlessly/laissez-faire
